p: Here, we examined the phenotypic expression of native and alien Bidens species in response to nutrient availability and disturbance. Specifically, the following questions were addressed: (a) Do native, noninvasive, and invasive alien Bidens species exhibit differential morphological and functional traits? (b) Do Bidens species respond differently to fertilization and competition treatments? (c) Does invasive Bidens species have morphological characteristics that better facilitate long‚Äêdistance dispersal compared to noninvasive species?
